{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21811v1", "title": "Coarse Baum-Connes and warped cones: failure of surjectivity in odd
  degree", "summary": "We prove a conjecture of Roe by constructing unified warped cones that
violate the coarse Baum-Connes conjecture. Interestingly, the reason for this
is probably not what Roe expected, as the obstruction arises in odd rather than
even degree.", "main_category": "math.KT", "categories": "math.KT,math.MG,math.OA", "published": "2025-04-30T17:15:20Z"}
